show.title: Contract Kaathal
show.sharing_text: हेलो! मैंने कुकू एफएम पर इस शो को सुना और मेरे ख्‍याल से आपको भी पसंद आएगा
show.sharing_text_v2:
हेलो! मैंने कुकू एफएम पर इस शो को सुना और मेरे ख्‍याल से आपको भी पसंद आएगा 
https://links.kukufm.com/fvmHTD
show.description: Sanjanaavukku andru nichchayatharththam. Avalukkup pidikkatha, vayathaana oruththarudan avalathu petror thirumanam seythu vaikka erpadu seykiraargal. Athilirunthu thappikka muyarchi seythaval rishi enpavanudan iravaik kazhikkum nilai erpadukirathu. Aanal, antha iravukkup piragu avalathu vaazhkkaiye maarivittathu. Eppadi maariyathu? Enna nadanthathu?
show.description_secondary: Sanjanaavukku andru nichchayatharththam. Avalukkup pidikkatha, vayathaana oruththarudan avalathu petror thirumanam seythu vaikka erpadu seykiraargal. Athilirunthu thappikka muyarchi seythaval rishi enpavanudan iravaik kazhikkum nilai erpadukirathu. Aanal, antha iravukkup piragu avalathu vaazhkkaiye maarivittathu. Eppadi maariyathu? Enna nadanthathu?

review.pinned_review_rating: Vanakkam...!  Immerse yourself in the love story of Rishi and Sanjana, and experience the joy each episode brings.
